SELECT A.ITEM_CODE, A.ITEM_NAME, A.ITEM_GROUP, A.ITEM_STANDARD, A.ITEM_ADMIN, A.ITEM_DEPART, A.ITEM_SITE, A.ITEM_ROOM, A.ITEM_GET_DATE, A.ITEM_GET_PRICE, A.ITEM_NOTE, B.DEVICE_ID, B.WORKER_ID, B.LOCATION, B.DATE_TIME, CASE (B.STATE) WHEN "1" THEN '입고' END AS STATE FROM tb_item_info A LEFT JOIN tb_tag_input_history B ON A.TAG = B.TAG
AND A.TAG = B.TAG
AND B.DEVICE_ID IN(
#{deviceIdArr}
)
AND A.ITEM_CODE like CONCAT('%',#{itemCode},'%')
AND A.ITEM_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{itemName},'%')
AND A.ITEM_GROUP like CONCAT('%',#{itemGroup},'%')
AND A.ITEM_STANDARD like CONCAT('%',#{itemStandard},'%')
AND A.ITEM_ADMIN like CONCAT('%',#{itemAdmin},'%')
AND A.ITEM_DEPART like CONCAT('%',#{itemDepart},'%')
AND A.ITEM_SITE like CONCAT('%',#{itemSite},'%')
AND A.ITEM_ROOM like CONCAT('%',#{itemRoom},'%')
AND A.ITEM_GET_DATE BETWEEN #{itemGetStartDate} AND #{itemGetEndDate}
AND A.ITEM_GET_PRICE BETWEEN #{itemGetLowPrice} AND #{itemGetHighPrice}
AND A.ITEM_NOTE like CONCAT('%',#{itemNote},'%')

SELECT A.ITEM_CODE, A.ITEM_NAME, A.ITEM_GROUP, A.ITEM_STANDARD, A.ITEM_ADMIN, A.ITEM_DEPART, A.ITEM_SITE, A.ITEM_ROOM, A.ITEM_GET_DATE, A.ITEM_GET_PRICE, A.ITEM_NOTE, B.DEVICE_ID, B.WORKER_ID, B.LOCATION, B.DATE_TIME, CASE (B.STATE) WHEN "0" THEN '출고' END AS STATE FROM tb_item_info A LEFT JOIN tb_tag_output_history B ON A.TAG = B.TAG
AND A.TAG = B.TAG
AND B.DEVICE_ID IN(
#{deviceIdArr}
)
AND A.ITEM_CODE like CONCAT('%',#{itemCode},'%')
AND A.ITEM_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{itemName},'%')
AND A.ITEM_GROUP like CONCAT('%',#{itemGroup},'%')
AND A.ITEM_STANDARD like CONCAT('%',#{itemStandard},'%')
AND A.ITEM_ADMIN like CONCAT('%',#{itemAdmin},'%')
AND A.ITEM_DEPART like CONCAT('%',#{itemDepart},'%')
AND A.ITEM_SITE like CONCAT('%',#{itemSite},'%')
AND A.ITEM_ROOM like CONCAT('%',#{itemRoom},'%')
AND A.ITEM_GET_DATE BETWEEN #{itemGetStartDate} AND #{itemGetEndDate}
AND A.ITEM_GET_PRICE BETWEEN #{itemGetLowPrice} AND #{itemGetHighPrice}
AND A.ITEM_NOTE like CONCAT('%',#{itemNote},'%')

SELECT IOHistory.* FROM (SELECT A.ITEM_CODE, A.ITEM_NAME, A.ITEM_GROUP, A.ITEM_STANDARD, A.ITEM_ADMIN, A.ITEM_DEPART, A.ITEM_SITE, A.ITEM_ROOM, A.ITEM_GET_DATE, A.ITEM_GET_PRICE, A.ITEM_NOTE, B.DEVICE_ID, B.WORKER_ID, B.LOCATION, B.DATE_TIME, CASE (B.STATE) WHEN "1" THEN 'IN' END AS STATE FROM tb_item_info A LEFT JOIN tb_tag_input_history B ON A.TAG = B.TAG
WHERE A.TAG = B.TAG
UNION
SELECT A.ITEM_CODE, A.ITEM_NAME, A.ITEM_GROUP, A.ITEM_STANDARD, A.ITEM_ADMIN, A.ITEM_DEPART, A.ITEM_SITE, A.ITEM_ROOM, A.ITEM_GET_DATE, A.ITEM_GET_PRICE, A.ITEM_NOTE, B.DEVICE_ID, B.WORKER_ID, B.LOCATION, B.DATE_TIME, CASE (B.STATE) WHEN "0" THEN 'OUT' END AS STATE FROM tb_item_info A LEFT JOIN tb_tag_output_history B ON A.TAG = B.TAG
WHERE A.TAG = B.TAG) IOHistory
AND IOHistory.DEVICE_ID IN(
#{deviceIdArr}
)
AND IOHistory.ITEM_CODE like CONCAT('%',#{itemCode},'%')
AND IOHistory.ITEM_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{itemName},'%')
AND IOHistory.ITEM_GROUP like CONCAT('%',#{itemGroup},'%')
AND IOHistory.ITEM_STANDARD like CONCAT('%',#{itemStandard},'%')
AND IOHistory.ITEM_ADMIN like CONCAT('%',#{itemAdmin},'%')
AND IOHistory.ITEM_DEPART like CONCAT('%',#{itemDepart},'%')
AND IOHistory.ITEM_SITE like CONCAT('%',#{itemSite},'%')
AND IOHistory.ITEM_ROOM like CONCAT('%',#{itemRoom},'%')
AND IOHistory.ITEM_GET_DATE BETWEEN #{itemGetStartDate} AND #{itemGetEndDate}
AND IOHistory.ITEM_GET_PRICE BETWEEN #{itemGetLowPrice} AND #{itemGetHighPrice}
AND IOHistory.ITEM_NOTE like CONCAT('%',#{itemNote},'%')
AND IOHistory.DATE_TIME BETWEEN #{startDateTime} AND #{endDateTime}
AND IOHistory.WORKER_ID like CONCAT('%',#{workerId},'%')
AND IOHistory.STATE like CONCAT('%',#{state},'%')
